title: tHE dARK kNIGHT - Experience Joker.avi
description:
What started off as an exercise in making a Red Hot Chili Peppers music video utilizing my DVD ripping/editing skills plus my Dark Knight DVD, has turned into a 5 year long edit (off and on from 2009 - 2014) and ended at a half-hour long (newly scored) journey from start thru finish. The focus is on the award winning JoKeR performance by Mr. Ledger. Sometimes it's about what's being said on screen, sometimes the visuals speak louder than any words can communicate. Minus any music by The Red Hot Chili Peppers.
